trans:
üòä I thought to myself immediately, see the karma
- And I thought to myself, when people are drunk, if there's something weighing on their mind, they'll let it all out, just like when I told (in story 4) about how I jumped at her boyfriend because I was haunted by what he had done to Po many times, including speaking badly to me
- Because during their trip to Nakhon Nayok, Sister Fhan was selling glutathione lotions well, as she was the one who invited Sister Fhan to sell them
- But I sensed that she must have something weighing on her mind to act like that
Story 7, the latest one, where she went on a livestream about the sister she had been with for 4 years selling glutathione lotion together
- Which, before this I must say she called! Texted and tried to make me take her side all the time
(Even though she and I barely talk anymore and she's much closer to Sister Fhan)
- Every time she called, I would always say, I can't say anything about this matter (I'm not involved in selling glutathione with you all)
- Every time she called, I would say, should I call and set up a conference call
- We think that, as friends, if there's something they don't understand about each other, they can call and talk
